    • Method Detail

      • set_rate_limiting

        public void set_rate_limiting(Boolean rate_limit,
                              Long min_wait)
        Enable or disable rate limiting on requests to the Mediawiki servers. If rate limiting is not enabled, under some circumstances (depending on load on Wikipedia, the number of requests you and other `wikipedia` users are making, and other factors), Wikipedia may return an HTTP timeout error. Enabling rate limiting generally prevents that issue, but please note that HTTPTimeoutError still might be raised.
        Parameters:
        rate_limit - (Boolean) - whether to enable rate limiting or not
        min_wait - (milliseconds) - if rate limiting is enabled, `min_wait` is a timedelta describing the minimum time to wait before requests.

      • geosearch

        public List<Document> geosearch(Double latitude,
                                Double longitude)
        Do a wikipedia geo search for `latitude` and `longitude` using HTTP API described in http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:GeoData
        Parameters:
        latitude - - latitude of center point
        longitude - - longitude of center point
        Returns:
        10 results in a radius of 10000 from the center point

      • geosearch

        public List<Document> geosearch(Double latitude,
                                Double longitude,
                                String title,
                                int results,
                                int radius)
        Do a wikipedia geo search for `latitude` and `longitude` using HTTP API described in http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:GeoData
        Parameters:
        latitude - - latitude of center point
        longitude - - longitude of center point
        title - - The title of an article to search for
        results - - the maximum number of results returned
        radius - - Search radius in meters. The value must be between 10 and 10000
        Returns:
        a list of documents near the center point

      • suggest

        public List<Document> suggest(String query)
        Get a Wikipedia search suggestion for `query`.
        Parameters:
        query - search query
        Returns:
        a list of documents or nothing if no suggestion was found.

      • random

        public List<Document> random(int pages)
        Get a list of random Wikipedia article titles.
        Parameters:
        pages - the number of random pages returned (max of 10)
        Returns:
        a list of randomly selected documents
        See Also:
        example url note:: Random only gets articles from namespace 0, meaning no Category, User talk, or other meta-Wikipedia pages.

      • search

        public List<Document> search(String term)
                      throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception

      • search

        public List<Document> search(String query,
                             int results,
                             boolean suggestion)
                      throws Exception
        Do a Wikipedia search for `query`.
        Parameters:
        query - search query
        results - the maxmimum number of results returned
        suggestion - if True, return results and suggestion (if any) in a tuple
        Returns:
        list of matching documents
        Throws:
        Exception
